pages.text: $(9)Absorption$() is an interesting effect.$(p)Each level grants 2 additional temporary hearts.$(p)However, these hearts don't refresh during the duration, so a $(l:apotheosis:potion/charms/charm)Potion Charm$() is preferrable.

pages.title: Brewing Recipe
pages.text: This potion can be crafted with an Awkward Potion and a Golden Apple.$(p)It can be extended, strengthend, or turned into a splash potion with the usual ingredients.
